resources.string: An augmented reality experience only available at University of East Anglia! Stand on a marker and give it a go!
Welcome to ViewEA! This page will give you a few tips on what this app does and how to use it.
ViewEA is an application that employs augmented reality techniques to give you interesting info about the buildings that surround you.

Eagle-eyed visitors to campus may notice several ViewEA signs dotted around on the floor. Stand on (or near) a sign and point your phones camera at the building in question to recieve some information aboutit.
Sharing is caring! If youd like to share the building youre currently at with friends, press the share button while at one of the ViewEA signs.
